item.animalcrops.anemonemal.tooltip: Plant underwater to grow the animal
item.animalcrops.magnemone.tooltip: Plant under lava to grow the animal
item.animalcrops.pollen.tooltip: Use on animals to create animal seeds
item.animalcrops.seeds.tooltip: Plant on grass or podzol to grow the animal
item.animalcrops.spores.tooltip: Plant on nether soil to grow the animal
